post:
Hi Everyone!

Use coupon code LET25MAY for 25% off on any quarterly, 6 months, or 1-year term.

All servers included from 512 MB Ram all the way up to 8GB.

NL Order link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=33

UK Order link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?gid=29

CPU: Mix of E3-1270v6(UK), E-2276G(UK+NL), and E-2278G(UK+NL)
RAM: 512MB to 8GB
Disk: NVMe from 10GB to 100GB
Bandwidth: From 1.5TB to 24TB
Free complimentary DDOS protection on all plans.
Free direct admin license for any UK or NL VPS.
Prices starting at €1.50 /month equivalent on the 512MB plan after discount.

To make this even easier I am happy to provide a 48-hour no-questions-asked refund on any plan ordered using the above coupon code.

---

Example plans:

**KVM 2GB**

* 2 CPU Core (Equal Share)
* 2048 MB Ram
* 30 GB Pure NVMe SSD Disk space
* 6000 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
* 1 x IPv4 address
* 1 x /64 IPv6
* FREE complimentary DDOS protection
* FREE Direct admin license on request.
 
€3.75 /month equivalent.
Amsterdam Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=215
London Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=185

---


**KVM 3GB**

* 2 CPU Core (Equal Share)
* 3GB Ram
* 40 GB Pure NVMe SSD Disk space
* 9000 GB Bandwidth @ 1 gbit (shared)
* 1 x IPv4 address
* 1 x /64 IPv6
* FREE complimentary DDOS protection
* FREE Direct admin license on request.

€5.63 /month equivalent.
Amsterdam Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=216
London Link: https://clients.inceptionhosting.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=186

---

**BONUS:** For the next 48 hours only, Pay for 1 year upfront and get the choice between 25% extra disk space or 25% extra bandwidth, to claim the bonus please **open a ticket after purchase and before** installing your OS for the first time.

---

Payment options:

* PayPal.
* Stripe - Credit/debit card.
* Coingate - Around 50 crypto currencies accepted.

Network testing tools: https://as62240.net/tools
Network speed test tools: https://as62240.net/speedtest

---

FAQ's & Helpful info

* Orders via VPN's or proxies are not accepted.
* Orders from Brazil and China are not accepted.
* We do not allow crypto activities on our servers
* Copyright abuse notice for torrenting = termination of service
* Additional IP's are €15 /year
* Yes rDNS/PTR record creation is automated for both IPv4 and IPv6
* Yes NL ports can burst to 10gbit
* When you reach your bandwidth limit services are suspended until the 1st of the next month.
* Windows media is provided.
* CPU FUP is the very first thing in the terms you agree to during sign up, please read that if nothing else :) 

---

If there are any questions or custom quotes wanted, it is a good time to ask. Inception Hosting can offer dedicated single-tenant/customer nodes with VPS creation on demand, smart dedicated servers (single-tenant 99% resources), Dedicated CPU and Disk options on VPS servers, and managed virtual servers.

Need something a bit different to the usual offers you see, why not ask, if it can be done it will be done.

Thank you for your time.
